questions.question: At nodal point, the vibration of a revolving shaft is
As damping factor increases, at which frequency ratio does phase angle increases?

answers.a: When frequency ratio is less than unity
answers.b: When frequency ratio is more than unity

questions.question:
Magnification factor is maximum at resonance 
 1. Magnification factor is minimum at resonance 
 2. The maximum value of amplification factor increases as damping factor decreases 
 3. The maximum value of amplification factor increases as damping factor increases 
 4. Magnification factor is maximum at resonance

answers.d: All the above statements are true

questions.question: Magnification factor is the ratio of

answers.a: zero frequency deflection and amplitude of steady state vibrations
answers.b: amplitude of steady state vibrations and zero frequency deflection
answers.c: amplitude of unsteady state vibrations and zero frequency distribution
